searchengine

Class InvertedIndex

  • java.lang.Object
    • searchengine.InvertedIndex
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Index
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    InvertedIndexHashMap, InvertedIndexTreeMap

    public abstract class InvertedIndex
extends java.lang.Object
implements Index
    InvertedIndex is a super class, which is extended by InvertedIndexHashMap and InvertedIndexTreeMap. The interface, Index, is implemented by InvertedIndex, and the build and lookup methods are overridden.

      • build

        public void build(java.util.List<Website> sites)
        The build method processes a list of websites into the index data structure. This method adds words as keys and lists of websites as values into the map. The method starts by first creating a list of Website objects, which will be initialized later in the code. For each website object in the sites list, teh method retrieves the list of words in the Website object and puts the list of words into a new list, wordlist. If this list is not empty, for each word in wordlist, the method checks if the word is already in the map. If not, the website object is added to the new ArrayList, valueList, which will be set as Value in the map. The word is then added as Key and the list as Value in the map. If the map already contains the word as Key, then we retrieve the value mapped to the word and insert it into newList. If newList does not contain the website object, we add the website object to this list and finally replace the Key and Value in the map with the word as key and newList as Value.
        Specified by:
        build in interface Index
        Parameters:
        sites - The list of websites that should be indexed

      • lookup

        public java.util.List<Website> lookup(java.lang.String query)
        Given a query string, returns a list of all websites that contain the query. Hence, if the Map contains query as Key, it will return the Value mapped to that Key.
        Specified by:
        lookup in interface Index
        Parameters:
        query - The query
        Returns:
        the list of websites that contains the query word.
